description: Evaluate probe information and define HTTP/HTTPS routing rules.

commands.name: az network application-gateway rule create
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway rule create --gateway-name
                                           --name
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--address-pool]
                                           [--http-listener]
                                           [--http-settings]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--priority]
                                           [--redirect-config]
                                           [--rewrite-rule-set]
                                           [--rule-type {Basic, PathBasedRouting}]
                                           [--url-path-map]
examples: az network application-gateway rule create -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyRule --http-listener MyBackendListener --rule-type Basic --address-pool MyAddressPool --http-settings MyHttpSettings

commands.name: az network application-gateway rule delete
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway rule delete --gateway-name
                                           --name
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network application-gateway rule delete -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyRule

commands.name: az network application-gateway rule list
examples: az network application-gateway rule list -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway

commands.name: az network application-gateway rule show
commands.summary: Get the details of a rule.
examples: az network application-gateway rule show -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyRule

commands.name: az network application-gateway rule update
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway rule update --gateway-name
                                           --name
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--add]
                                           [--address-pool]
                                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--http-listener]
                                           [--http-settings]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--priority]
                                           [--redirect-config]
                                           [--remove]
                                           [--rewrite-rule-set]
                                           [--rule-type {Basic, PathBasedRouting}]
                                           [--set]
                                           [--url-path-map]
examples: az network application-gateway rule update -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyRule --http-listener MyNewBackendListener

commands.name: az network application-gateway rule wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
